sense.def:
Kar je
subsidiary
, je manj pomembno kot nekaj drugega, s čimer je povezano.

seg.quote: The Department offers a course in Opera Studies as a subsidiary subject.
I tried to discuss this and some subsidiary questions.

sense.def:
A subsidiary
je podjetje, ki je del večjega podjetja.

seg.quote: The British company is a subsidiary of Racal Electronics.
